title: ‘Mawatha’  – A Policy Document
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Policy Document of the ‘Mawatha’ program which brings together academics, experts, and intellectuals to a common platform to discuss and deliberate present day issues in Sri Lanka with the aim of also highlighting the correct path (Mawatha) that needs to be followed to over come those issues, was launched on Thursday (21).
Access ‘Mawatha’  A policy document Here : Mawatha – A Policy Document
